General.Name: GECI International SA
General.Description: GECI International S.A. provides digital solutions and technology consulting services in France and Brazil. It operates through Digital and Technology segments. The company offers outsourcing and training services, cyber security and data protection solutions, computing solutions, and IT infrastructure solutions. It also offers telecoms and engineering solutions and smart products. The company serves clients in industry, finance, research, services, and telecom sectors. The company was founded in 1979 and is headquartered in Paris, France.
